opponent.label: Aaravi
opponent.description: Prepare to die! Aaravi (aka "The Slayer") is Spooky High's foremost expert on highly efficient violence, loot collection, dungeon delving, and inventory management. A seasoned gamer, she loves little more than combat, bloodshed, and violence - but get on her good side, and you might just get a peek under that incredibly deadly and violent exterior at the slightly softer but no less violent tsundere underneath.
